hibernate-mapping.query: select correctionalStatusTerm from omis.supervision.domain.CorrectionalStatusTerm as correctionalStatusTerm where correctionalStatusTerm.offender = :offender order by correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate desc

select correctionalStatusTerm from omis.supervision.domain.CorrectionalStatusTerm as correctionalStatusTerm where correctionalStatusTerm.offender = :offender and ( (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate is null or correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate > :date) and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate is null or correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate <= :date) )

select count (correctionalStatusTerm) from omis.supervision.domain.CorrectionalStatusTerm correctionalStatusTerm where (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate <= :endDate or :endDate is null) and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate > :startDate or (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate is null or :startDate is null)) and correctionalStatusTerm.offender = :offender

select count (correctionalStatusTerm) from omis.supervision.domain.CorrectionalStatusTerm correctionalStatusTerm where (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate <= :endDate or :endDate is null) and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate > :startDate or (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate is null or :startDate is null)) and correctionalStatusTerm.offender = :offender and correctionalStatusTerm not in (:excludeCorrectionalStatusTerms)

select correctionalStatusTerm from omis.supervision.domain.CorrectionalStatusTerm correctionalStatusTerm where correctionalStatusTerm.offender = :offender and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate = :endDate or (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate is null and :endDate is null))

select correctionalStatusTerm from omis.supervision.domain.CorrectionalStatusTerm correctionalStatusTerm where correctionalStatusTerm.offender = :offender and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate = :startDate or (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate is null and :startDate is null))

select correctionalStatusTerm from omis.supervision.domain.CorrectionalStatusTerm correctionalStatusTerm where correctionalStatusTerm.offender = :offender and correctionalStatusTerm.correctionalStatus = :correctionalStatus and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate = :startDate or (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate is null and :startDate is null)) and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate = :endDate or (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate is null and :endDate is null))

select correctionalStatusTerm from omis.supervision.domain.CorrectionalStatusTerm correctionalStatusTerm where correctionalStatusTerm.offender = :offender and correctionalStatusTerm.correctionalStatus = :correctionalStatus and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate = :startDate or (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.startDate is null and :startDate is null)) and (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate = :endDate or (correctionalStatusTerm.dateRange.endDate is null and :endDate is null)) and correctionalStatusTerm not in (:excludedCorrectionalStatusTerms)
